All operations scoped to calling extension's install_id
Endpoint resolution: convert path string to endpoint_id
Endpoint resolution uses installed version's endpoint table
Endpoint resolution rejects paths not in extension manifest
Endpoint resolution limits to GET/POST methods (v1 constraint)
Endpoint resolution rejects paths with path parameters
list() returns all schedules for the calling extension's install
list() returns empty array when no schedules exist
get() returns schedule by ID if it belongs to the install
get() returns null for non-existent schedule
get() returns null for schedule belonging to different install
create() creates schedule with valid input
create() returns scheduleId on success
create() validates cron expression
create() validates timezone
create() validates payload JSON
create() validates schedule name length
create() enforces max 50 schedules per install
create() enforces minimum 5-minute interval
create() returns structured error on validation failure
create() returns field-level errors when applicable
create() creates underlying job runner schedule when enabled
create() defaults timezone to UTC if not provided
create() defaults enabled to true if not provided
update() updates schedule fields
update() validates new cron expression if provided
update() validates new timezone if provided
update() reschedules job runner when cron/timezone/enabled changes
update() returns error for non-existent schedule
update() returns error for schedule belonging to different install
update() can change endpoint by path
delete() removes schedule from database
delete() cancels underlying job runner schedule
delete() returns success for valid schedule
delete() returns error for non-existent schedule
delete() returns error for schedule belonging to different install
